topic.title: HP Helion 1.3 Development Platform: Quick Start Developer Trial

body.p: The Quick Start Developer Trial is the fastest way to evaluate the HP Helion Development Platform for yourself. Download the files, create and configure your sandbox environment, and deploy one or more sample applications. We provide several sample applications to help you get started quickly, but you may also use your own.

Limited time offer: Use the promotional code WINHDP to get a three-month free trial account on the HP Public Cloud. This limited promotional code is valid only for the first 250 customers and only for use with the Helion Development Platform trial. If you are a current HP Public Cloud user and want to explore the new Windows features, please create a new account using this promotional code.
To ensure your success, complete the installation steps in the order they are listed below. You can also download the entire instruction set in a printable format.

strow.stentry:
1. Register for your Helion Public Cloud Account
2. Download Tools
3. Create the Sandbox Environment
4. Create a Cluster
5. Add Windows DEA and SQL Server (Optional Step)
6. Explore Sample Applications

Register for a Helion Public Cloud account.
Keep your username and password handy as you will be asked for them during installation. Registering provides you with:
A Cloud Credit to help cover hosting costs for your sandbox environment
Access to the Helion Development Platform download repositories Ensure that you review HP Public Cloud pricing to understand what charges may be incurred if the use limits of the free credit offer are exceeded.
